#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

void yes() {
    cout << "YES\n";
    return;
}

void no() {
    cout << "NO\n";
    return;
}
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while (t--) {
    string a;
   // char *a;

    cin >> a ;
    int len = a.length();
    int length = len;
    //a = &temp[0];
    int sum = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        sum = sum + (int)(a[i] - '0');
    }

   // cout << sum << endl;

    int k;
    cin >> k;

    int temp = a[length - 1] - '0';
    if(k == 1) {
        cout << "YES\n";
    }
    if(k == 10) {
        if(a[length - 1] == '0') yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 5) {
        if((a[length - 1] == '0' ) || (a[length - 1] == '5')) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 2) {
        if(temp % 2 == 0) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 3) {
        if(sum % 3 == 0) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 9) {
        if(sum % 9 == 0) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 6) {
        if((sum % 3 == 0 )&& (temp % 2 == 0)) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 4) {
        int temp2;
        if(length >= 2)
            temp2 = (a[length - 2] - '0') * 10 + (a[length - 1] - '0');
        else
            temp2 = (a[length - 1] - '0');
        if(temp2 % 4 == 0) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 8) {
        int temp3;
        if(length == 1)
            temp3 = (a[length - 1] - '0');
        else if(length == 2)
            temp3 = (a[length - 2] - '0') * 10 + (a[length - 1] - '0');
        else
            temp3 = (a[length - 3] - '0') * 100 + (a[length - 2] - '0') * 10 + (a[length - 1] - '0');
        if(temp3 % 8 == 0) yes();
        else no();
    } else if(k == 7) {
        reverse(a.begin(), a.end());
        int aa[6] = {1,3,2,6,4,5};
        int temp_sum = 0;
        for(int i = 0;i < len; i++) {
            temp_sum = temp_sum + (int(a[i] - '0')) * aa[i % 6];
        }

        if(temp_sum % 7 == 0) yes();
        else no();
    }
	}
    return 0;
}
